title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Integrating Curriculum and Pedagogy for Higher Education Administrator Leaders

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in corporate language education planning and demonstrated leadership capabilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can analyze alignment between curriculum objectives and instructional methods to propose effective language learning environment designs
Learners can establish mobile microlearning content development processes using conceptual learning design frameworks
Learners can create action plans to revise and enhance curriculum-instruction integration strategies based on formative assessment results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
